function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Choice of interior design facilitating the spread of the virus and virus retention on surfaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease infection and spread of the virus within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Careful selection of furniture and materials, prioritizing easy-to-clean surfaces. Improving ventilation and airflow to reduce virus retention.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV sanitation, touchless fixtures, HEPA filters, smart HVAC systems.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and residents of the built environment.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, homeowners, facility managers."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality leading to increased risk of disease infection.","Impact":"Higher risk of virus transmission and airborne spread within indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, maintaining optimal humidity levels, and installing air purification systems.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, smart thermostats, natural ventilation solutions.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and residents of the built environment.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, HVAC technicians."},{"Description":"Exterior and outdoor spaces becoming essential due to the pandemic, leading to potential overcrowding and virus transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in outdoor and exterior spaces, compromising social distancing measures.","Mitigation":"Designing outdoor spaces to accommodate social distancing, promoting usage of outdoor areas with appropriate safety measures.","Technologies":"Smart outdoor furniture with sensor-based distancing alerts, outdoor lighting for extended use, contactless amenities.","People":"Visitors, residents, and maintenance staff of outdoor and exterior spaces.","Owner":"Landscape architects, property developers, outdoor space managers."}]}
